Package org.mundo.reflect

Provides reflection classes for remote inspection.

See:

Class Summary
CIDLParser A parser for CORBA IDL.
GenericClientStub A generic DoObject supporting dynamic invocations.
MArray Objects of this class represent arrays.
MBaseType Objects of this class represent Java-native types.
MCIFParser A parser for the MundoCore Compact Interface Format used internally by stubs.
MClass Objects of this class represent interfaces.
MClassType Note: Since we can get class names from a remote node, we might not have the corresponding class objects locally.
MField Objects of this class represent parameters.
MInterface Objects of this class represent interfaces.
MMeta Base class for Mundo reflection classes.
MMethod Objects of this class represent methods.
MPackage Objects of this class represent packages.
MParam Objects of this class represent parameters.
MType This is the base class for types.
 

Enum Summary
MParam.Direction Describes whether a parameter is input, output, or both.
 

Package org.mundo.reflect Description

Provides reflection classes for remote inspection. MundoCore requires a custom reflection framework, because the implementations of remote services to inspect may not be available locally. In addition, remote services can also be implemented in other languages than Java.
